subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 33 points and got the entire fourth quarter off, Michael Beasley scored 19 off the bench and the host Miami Heat had little trouble beating the Milwaukee Bucks.
snippet: LeBron James scored 33 points and got the entire fourth quarter off, Michael Beasley scored 19 off the bench and the host Miami Heat had little trouble beating the Milwaukee Bucks.
